REPORT.name: Трафик по часам
REPORT.description: Name: Отчет по трафику, показывает объем в МБ по часам за указанный интервал времени Author: NodaSoft E-mail: support@gameclass.ru
REPORT.code:
if object_id('tempdb..#tth') is not null DROP TABLE #tth
CREATE TABLE #tth ( [id] [int] NOT NULL , [name] [varchar] (15) COLLATE Cyrillic_General_CI_AS NULL ) ON [PRIMARY]
INSERT INTO #tth (id, name) VALUES (0, N'00:00') INSERT INTO #tth (id, name) VALUES (1, N'01:00') INSERT INTO #tth (id, name) VALUES (2, N'02:00') INSERT INTO #tth (id, name) VALUES (3, N'03:00') INSERT INTO #tth (id, name) VALUES (4, N'04:00') INSERT INTO #tth (id, name) VALUES (5, N'05:00') INSERT INTO #tth (id, name) VALUES (6, N'06:00') INSERT INTO #tth (id, name) VALUES (7, N'07:00') INSERT INTO #tth (id, name) VALUES (8, N'08:00') INSERT INTO #tth (id, name) VALUES (9, N'09:00') INSERT INTO #tth (id, name) VALUES (10, N'10:00') INSERT INTO #tth (id, name) VALUES (11, N'11:00') INSERT INTO #tth (id, name) VALUES (12, N'12:00') INSERT INTO #tth (id, name) VALUES (13, N'13:00') INSERT INTO #tth (id, name) VALUES (14, N'14:00') INSERT INTO #tth (id, name) VALUES (15, N'15:00') INSERT INTO #tth (id, name) VALUES (16, N'16:00') INSERT INTO #tth (id, name) VALUES (17, N'17:00') INSERT INTO #tth (id, name) VALUES (18, N'18:00') INSERT INTO #tth (id, name) VALUES (19, N'19:00') INSERT INTO #tth (id, name) VALUES (20, N'20:00') INSERT INTO #tth (id, name) VALUES (21, N'21:00') INSERT INTO #tth (id, name) VALUES (22, N'22:00') INSERT INTO #tth (id, name) VALUES (23, N'23:00')
select #tth.name as [Час суток], CAST(sum(SessionsAdd.Traffic)/1024/1024 as [numeric] (12,2)) [traffic in MB], CAST(sum(SessionsAdd.Traffic)/1024 as [numeric] (12,2)) [traffic in KB] from [Sessions] inner join SessionsAdd on (SessionsAdd.idSessions = Sessions.id)
inner join #tth on (#tth.[id] = DATEPART(hour, [started])) where ([started] >= %TIME-START%) and ([started]<=%TIME-STOP%) GROUP BY #tth.name order by [Час суток]
REPORT.author: NodaSoft
